productDescriptions.jengkol:
**Frozen Jengkol - Practical Solution for Indonesian Cuisine Cravings!**

For those of you in Japan who are craving the distinctive taste of jengkol, now you don't have to worry anymore! Frozen Jengkol is here as a practical solution to satisfy your cravings for your favorite jengkol dishes.

**Product Benefits:**
‚Ä¢ Carefully frozen to maintain quality, texture, and distinctive aroma
‚Ä¢ Ready to use anytime without lengthy soaking or boiling from scratch
‚Ä¢ Saves time and energy, perfect for busy lifestyles
‚Ä¢ Can be prepared as stew, balado, or other jengkol dishes

productDescriptions.1: Indomie Goreng Ayam Bawang is a delicious and flavorful instant fried noodle with chicken and onion flavor. Ready to serve in just 3 minutes, perfect for a quick meal or snack. Authentic Indonesian taste that brings the comfort of home to Japan.
productDescriptions.2: Bon Cabe Level 30 is a popular Indonesian chili flakes condiment that adds spicy flavor to any dish. Available in different spice levels to suit your preference. Sprinkle on noodles, rice, or any dish for an authentic Indonesian spicy kick.
productDescriptions.3: Rendang Padang Instant is a ready-to-eat authentic West Sumatran beef rendang in a convenient package. This rich, flavorful curry is made with traditional spices and tender beef. Just heat and serve for a taste of Indonesia's most famous dish.
productDescriptions.4: Kerupuk Udang Sidoarjo are authentic Indonesian shrimp crackers from Sidoarjo. These crispy, savory crackers are the perfect accompaniment to any Indonesian meal or as a standalone snack. Just fry until crispy and enjoy!
productDescriptions.5: Frozen Spinach is high-quality spinach that has been carefully processed and frozen to preserve its nutrients and flavor. Perfect for Indonesian dishes like sayur bayam or as a nutritious addition to any meal.
productDescriptions.6: Instant Rawon Seasoning is a complete spice mix for making authentic East Javanese black beef soup. This traditional Indonesian soup features a unique flavor from keluak nuts. Just add beef and water for a delicious, aromatic dish.
productDescriptions.7: Garuda Peanuts are premium quality roasted peanuts with the perfect balance of crispiness and flavor. These popular Indonesian snacks are perfect for any occasion or as a tasty treat anytime.
productDescriptions.8: Frozen Fried Tofu is ready-to-cook tofu that has been pre-fried and frozen for convenience. Perfect for Indonesian dishes like tahu goreng, tahu bacem, or as an addition to soups and stir-fries.
productDescriptions.9: ABC Sambal is a popular Indonesian chili sauce that adds spicy and sweet flavor to any dish. This versatile condiment is perfect for noodles, rice, or as a dipping sauce for fritters and other snacks.
productDescriptions.10: Melinjo Chips are traditional Indonesian crackers made from melinjo nuts. These unique crackers have a slightly bitter taste that pairs perfectly with Indonesian dishes or as a standalone snack.
productDescriptions.11: Organic Tempeh is premium quality fermented soybean cake, a staple protein source in Indonesian cuisine. This nutritious plant-based protein is perfect for frying, grilling, or adding to stir-fries and soups.
